page.title: 07THE CHURCH IN FELMINGHAM
page.content: Felmingham Church, dedicated to{St. {Andrew,}has a Family Eucharist each Sunday at 10.00 am. A Eucharist is held each Wednesday morning, and also on major Saints' Days. To help learn about the Beliefs of{The {Church of England,}a Bible Study Group meets once every 3 weeks. For the encouragement of younger members of the Church, there is a{Sunday School} for those under 8; and 2{Youth {Fellowships}for those between 8 & 16. The Church is kept neat and tidy by a rota of ladies, who both clean and make flower arrangements. Coffee follows the Eucharist on the first Sunday of each month, served under the Tower. The fellowship of the congregation is helped by monthly lunches and special social events.
